summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing financial matters. Staley, as the CEO of JPMorgan's Investment Bank, is responding to Epstein's concerns about financial losses. The email highlights the confidential nature of their communication.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is identified as the CEO of JPMorgan's Investment Bank and is responding to Jeffrey Epstein's email regarding financial issues.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email expressing concerns about financial losses and seeking assistance from Jes Staley.

connections.description: Jes Staley, as CEO of JPMorgan, is in a client relationship with Jeffrey Epstein, who is seeking financial advice.

keyFacts: Jes Staley is the CEO of JPMorgan's Investment Bank.
Jeffrey Epstein expresses concerns about losing six million dollars in investments.
The email communication is marked as confidential and may contain privileged information.
The correspondence indicates a financial advisory relationship between Staley and Epstein.
